"What were you planning on doing with me?" You shout as you bring him up to your face.
"You are our slave now! Surrender! Or feel my wrath!" At this last statement, you let out a laugh.
"Feel your wrath? Ha, try this on for size." You laugh as you bring your arm back and release the leader. You see him spiraling through the air, and land with a Plop in the water.
"Ok, now I bathroom bad!" You say as you stand up.
Than, a thought comes to mind. These small "people" are nothing more than insects to you. Who cares what they feel, or see!
"Heh, well here is as good a place as any!" You say as you strip off the remainder of your ratty clothes. You spread you legs apard wide, and start to piss all over the tiny playthings in the sand. Of corse the crowd starts to scatter, and you dont really care, so you just start walking forward to a tree that has some promising looking fruit on it.
On your way to the tree, you did not pay attention to where you were stepping, nor did you bother to stop the flow of stream flowing from your dick. As you walked to the tree, you felt a few things pop under your bare feet, but you just shruged them off, because who really cares anyway.

Soon you reach the tree and start to shimmy up it. About ten feet up is the first fruit, and it seems to be a regular sized banana!
"What luck!" You say, and remove one hand from the tree and grab the fruit. It was stuck, so you start to pull harder, and than with a snap, the fruit comes off the tree... along with you.
You land on your back in the center of the croud, but you cant feel/see anything because when you fell you got the wind knocked out of you, and blacked out. When you awake...
13112.title: Bare Nescessities

1312.content:
You don't have any clue what the hell is happening here, but you do know your pissed about it. A few of the island's people see yours eyes are open and start screaming, surprisingly, in english. "He is awake! He is awake!"
At first you think they will start acting chaotic, but instead they seem more interested and gather at your neckline and around your head to see what will happen next.
"Enough is enough!" you quietly mutter, and flex your left arm, instantly breaking the "restraints". You do the same with your right arm, and sit up. The crowd that was on your neckline begins to tumble off you, many landing face first in the sand around you, knocked out cold.
"What the hell is going on here?" As you scream this, you break your legs free of the restraints. All around you, the one inch people are franticly running around, with no clue what to do. You almost let out a laugh at seeing these tiny beings rushing around your legs, and a few thoughts come to your head. You could peacefully try to find out what was going on, or you could just get some payback for whatever they were planning to do to you.
1312.title: Enough is Enough

this giant was 432 feet tall give or take and inch. It was high tide when he washed up on the shore.

This was David Beckham.

"whats up with you?"

"You're not small"
"yeah well i'm an athelete and most of us are over 6 feet but i'm only just 6 feet."

He walked into the wood and followed the directions and found a clearing
On the floor was what looked like a tiny gun that fit into the palm of his hand.

The second one was continuation

The last was rate
He set them to 50, infinity, double and doubleday he couldnt really see exactly what he was setting them to though.

1411.content:
David fell over when the ray hit him and slept most of the night.
He woke up the next morning as most people do: hungry, thirsty and with a full bladder.
David noticed the clearing had gone so he sat up his head poked out the top of the trees.
"oh my god" he thought.
He was at least 50 feet tall.

A kid was walking a dog when he came across a large backpack. Suddenly a giant pair of fingers picked him off the ground and the dog ran away throught the trees.

David asked the kid to help him. by taking a look at the shrink ray which was still in his other hand so he put the kid on his palm and watched him look.

After a minute the kid told him that it looked like he was going to double in size every 12 hours. David then paniced and took the shrink ray too quickly and dropped it and it smashed.

"Dont worry," the kid said, "i'll help you get back to normal David."

"how do you know my name?" david said.

"everyone knows you" the kid responded.

"well i appriciate the help kid but your 7 inches tall to me."

David then opened his backpack and ate a breakfast bar and drank a bottle of water. He then kneeled down and relieved his bladder producing 463 litresof urine which the kid ran from and jump onto Davids sneaker.

"Man, my feet are aching, better lay them on the coffee table." Just then, David notices a bulge in his shoe. "Huh? What's that?" All of a sudden, his HUGE big toe sprang from his size 9.5 shoe. Out of nowhere, his feet started bulging in the shoes, bursting out of them with great force. His soles were now size 13.5 and growing. "Oh my god, he gasped, "I gotta get out of here before I balloon into a giant!" Just when he was getting up, his height shot up from 6 foot to 7 foot. Bumping his head on the ceiling, he passed out. Unconscious, his legs and arms began to grow too. A bulge from his pants was growing, and growing until his endowment broke through the zipper to be a 1 and a half foot long. He began to grow muscle like crazy, and his head and facial features were fitting to his colossal body. With his beefy soles at an enormous size 23, his shoes were torn to shreds. Just then, a knock was at the door. Mrs. Beverly, his neighbor, was complaining about the noise. All of a sudden, the door was open (as it wasn't locked when David came in), and she walked in. Gasping in shock, Mrs. Beverly was about to be crushed by David's growing body. In a last attempt, Mrs. Beverly ran upstairs and locked his bedroom door. "What has become of David?!", she yelled to the sky. Suddenly, a bump under her feet was growing, with David's giant head and 300 feet body destroying the ceiling. Downstairs, his legs and feet were so long and large that they broke through walls. As he was growing at an alarming rate and still unconscious, David smirked as his endowment grew fatter and harder at 30 feet. David had then destroyed the house. The floor Mrs. Beverly had stood on collapsed. There, Mrs. Beverly fell downstairs, only to be crushed under David's now ballooning butt. Just as fast it started, David Beckham originally 6 foot, was now 375 feet tall, with a throbbing "weapon", and enormous beefy size 90 feet. His butt had gotten plumper, and his head was huge.
